And go to Titus 3:5 and see what it says (Talkin' 'bout regeneration). I'm not talkin' 'bout artificial resuscitation (Talkin' 'bout regeneration). Just talkin' 'bout regeneration. This is regeneration-- this regeneration, baby. Why don't you all find the Way (Talkin' 'bout regeneration). What John chapter 3 verse 3 does say (Talkin' 'bout regeneration). And First Peter 1:23 says the same thing (Talkin' 'bout regeneration). It's just talkin' 'bout regeneration (Talkin' 'bout regeneration). This is regeneration-- this regeneration, baby.
